thread.title: UP Polls: SP-Congress alliance a 'corrupted' one, says Amit Shah
thread.title_full: UP Polls: SP-Congress alliance a 'corrupted' one, says Amit Shah

author: ANI
title: UP Polls: SP-Congress alliance a 'corrupted' one, says Amit Shah
text:
BJP President Amit Shah (Photo: PTI) Harchandrapur: Calling the Samajwadi Party-Congress alliance a 'corrupt' alliance, Bharatiya Janata Party president Amit Shah on Saturday said that both Mulayam Singh and Sonia Gandhi are fed up with their sons, Akhilesh and Rahul.
Addressing a rally in Sitapur , Shah also said that for 15 years, both SP and Bahujan Samajawadi Party (BSP) have not provided basic benefits like electricity, jobs, clean drinking water , medical facilities and proper roads to the people of Uttar Pradesh.
The BJP leader also blamed the Akhilesh Yadav government for poor management for mismanagement which has led to an increase in murders and rapes across the state.
Shah urged the people to vote for Prime Minister Modi and a BJP government in the state and assured that their government would work for the welfare of the people.
He said if elected to power, the BJP would waive off loans for small farmers and less deprived people. He also said the BJP -led government would also provide laptops with internet connectivity.
